name: Luma (Jack G)
description:
Control Luma as you explore a dark cemetery. Find and activate the four statues to power the center structure and release the trapped spirits.  Beware of the shadow spirits which want nothing more than to stop you. Flash your lantern to stun them so that you can get away. 

WASD-Move
Spacebar-Stun (5 second cooldown)
E-Activate a nearby statue or the center structure

This project was complete by myself,  Lori Carranza, Daniela Diaz-Rivera, Zachary Hanitz, and Angelo Pagluica as a two week project at the Florida Interactive Entertainment Academy within the University of Central Florida.
